code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./EducationalInfo.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EducationalInfo=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[educationData,setEducationData]=useState({sscSchoolName:'',sscMarks:'',SScBoardName:'',familyIncome:'',hasScholarship:false});const[formSubmitted,setFormSubmitted]=useState(false);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value,type,checked}=e.target;const val=type==='checkbox'?checked:value;setEducationData(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:val}));};const handleFormSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(educationData);setFormSubmitted(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"EI",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:''},children:"Educational Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleFormSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"SSC",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"ssc-S_name",type:"text",name:"sscSchoolName",value:educationData.sscSchoolName,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"SSC School Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"ssc-marks",type:"text",name:"sscMarks",value:educationData.sscMarks,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"SSC Marks (%)",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"SScBoardName",value:educationData.SScBoardName,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"SSC Board Name",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Income",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"familyIncome",value:educationData.familyIncome,onChange:handleChange,required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Select Income Range"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"lessThan10k",children:"Less than 50000"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"10kto50k",children:"50000 -
